title: Call for SPECIAL!
posting_body: ['LIV @ University II', 'Property Address', '4280 Escondido St, ,', 'Las Vegas, NV, 89119', '<URL>', 'The search is over!', 'We’ve got a charming  square foot apartment with your name on it.', 'Come check out our great community and tour your new home.', 'Rents for Studio bed, 1 bath units are as low as $1095.00 a month.', 'Floor Plan Details', 'Name: Studio', 'Studio / 1 Bathrooms', '$1,095.00', 'Community Amenities', 'Parking', 'Pool', 'Pet Policy', 'We accept your furry family members.', 'Dogs and cats, up to two pets per household, are welcome.', 'Dog weight limit of 25 lbs at full grown size.', '$250 pet fee per pet and $25 per month pet rent per pet.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday - Friday 8:00 A.M. - 5:00 P.M.', 'Property Contact', 'show contact info', 'ADA ACCESSIBLE', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY']
